     The Black and aubergine colored fighter craft streaked across 
the ope=
n skies like some dark predator in pursuit of prey .... 

> Hydras:

dras smirked he picked up the message and treachursly he send a 
> fake sig=
nature that everyone will confuse with Megatron Beast 
> Machine. He sent a=
lso some coordinates close to his base.

     The ship banked only slightly=
 in its flight path as it 
acknowledged the signal and location. Yet even a=
s it did so, it 
realized something: There was something wrong with the sig=
nal! 
Nothing that could be pinned down, but something was different about =

it. More Tiny ... More mechanical ... More ... something ... But it 
was n=
ear enough to Megatron's typical signature that the ship changed 
course. 
=

     The ship quickly neared it's goal, as it had already been moving 
in =
that direction. As it neared what would typically be the extreme 
edge of r=
adar range the ship shifted form to that of a rather large 
eagle with ebon=
y and deep purple plumage, similar to that of the 
ship. (This is how it wo=
uld appear to sensors as well) With a cry it 
flapped its wings as it fough=
t for hight, superior optics scanned the 
area ahead, infrared and ultravio=
let sights probing far ahead... 

> With the base allowin him access Jhiaxu=
s lowered the
> pod with the clone down inside. 

   The eagle swung around=
 the area a few times getting the lay of the 
land, then finally it opened =
a channel. "Greetings." A deep voice 
resonated across the channel. "I am M=
YRMIDON. To whom am I speaking?"

OOC: LOL!! My character transmitted with =
BW's codes and Hydra's came 
back with Beast Machines. I would assume that =
